about_the_game:
Corpsênia

Get ready for a relentless action experience and an engaging narrative in Corpsênia, a frenetic adventure game that challenges your skills in an alternate reality.

A Fictional Story:
Take on the role of Crow, a vigilante seeking revenge whose plot involves two intelligence services from four warring nations and a mysterious company that emerges in Brazil in the 90s, clearly in an alternate reality.

Brutal and Relentless Action:
Prepare to face intense challenges and visceral combat, where each encounter may lead to your death multiple times to pass a single level. Using a variety of lethal weapons, from pistols and knives to fictional weapons that can vary depending on each character's combat style, as you face human enemies and other types of foes.

Electrifying Soundtrack:
Immerse yourself in a hypnotic and pulsating atmosphere with an electrifying soundtrack that perfectly complements the frenetic action of the game. Let yourself be carried away by the beat as you advance through each level of the story where the soundtrack can change according to the protagonist of each level.

Retro Style, Modern Violence:
Enjoy a unique visual aesthetic inspired by the 80s and 90s, combined with fluid animations and modern, dynamic gameplay. Experience an immersive visual and auditory experience that will easily make you crave for more.

Consequences of Choices:
Certain choices have consequences, shaping the end of the main story of the game. With that in mind, think carefully, especially in the last chapters of the Campaign mode.

Multiple Game Modes:
I aimed to create a very fun game with several game options: Versus Mode, Survival against Hordes, Serial Killer, and even if one day all the game's online servers are closed, you can still play these game modes against the CPU.

The universe is infinite, humanity is inhuman, and every genius knows that to succeed once, it's necessary to fail countless times.

content_descriptors.notes:
Intense violence, including scenes of murder and brutal combat.
Depictions of illicit drug use.
References to sensitive themes, such as suicide and self-destructive behavior.
Criminal acts, including theft and urban violence.
